programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con man dons a remarkable suit that shrinks him down to the size of the insect, yet bestows him with incredible strength. With the help of his mentor who developed the technology, he must pull off a heist that will save the world.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: Basketball. Final Four Championship.

programme.title: Chad
programme.desc: A 14-year-old pubescent boy navigates his first year of high school on a mission to become popular. Chad's friendships and sanity are pushed to the limits as he uses every tactic at his disposal to befriend the cool kids.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Narcotics detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett have been assigned to a high-tech task force that is investigating the flow of designer ecstasy into Miami. Their inquiries inadvertently lead them to a major conspiracy involving a vicious kingpin.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a human body is found inside the mascot uniform of a rival school, Brennan and Booth investigate when the death may have occurred. Meanwhile, Booth helps his brother find a job after Jared is dishonourably discharged from the Navy.Guests: Brendan Fehr..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When Brenna decides she wants to have a baby, she asks Booth to father the child. The situation stirs up unspoken feelings and unresolved issues between the two, and Booth gets advice from an unlikely source: 'Family Guy's' Stewie Griffin.Guests: Stewie Griffin..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Everyone is a suspect when a body is found murdered at a popular nightclub known as 'The Lab.' In an unusual twist of storytelling, Brennan, Booth and the Jeffersonian team take on various roles serving as the nightclub staff.Guests: Motley Crue, Ryan O'Neal, Brendan Fehr, Eric Millegan..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Leo and Piper are sent to another plane, Phoebe and Paige mourn their deaths.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe casts a spell on herself that allows her wild teenage personality to take over.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Chris is attacked by a spider demon and infected with a venom that alters his personality.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters go before a magic tribunal to save the life of Detective Morris.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a string of unusual murders where the victims were all recipients of organs from the same donor. Things become even more complicated when the brothers find their killer in a trance mumbling an ancient prayer.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean become unknowing participants in a unique student film when they investigate a bizarre murder in a college town.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Benny calls Dean for help after being brutally beaten by vampires. Meanwhile, Sam reflects on the life he left behind with Amelia.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a murder and find Garth is already on the case. Dean is not happy he has assumed Bobby's duties, but Garth points out someone needed to do it.Guests: D.J. Qualls..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean are stunned when Castiel suddenly appears back on Earth with no memory of how he escaped from Purgatory. Meanwhile, Mrs. Tran enlists a witch to concoct a demon bomb, but the witch double crosses her.Guests: Cyrina Fiallo, Lauren Tom..

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two hip Miami undercover detectives have 72 hours to nab the crooks who stole millions in recovered heroin from the police station.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Narcotics detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett have been assigned to a high-tech task force that is investigating the flow of designer ecstasy into Miami. Their inquiries inadvertently lead them to a major conspiracy involving a vicious kingpin.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: United States Secret Service agent Mike Banning must go on the run after being framed for the attempted assassination of the President.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: San Francisco is taken hostage when a general seizes control of Alcatraz Island, threatening to launch missiles loaded with poison gas. Only a young FBI chemical weapons expert and a notorious Federal prisoner have the skills to penetrate the fortress.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: San Francisco is taken hostage when a general seizes control of Alcatraz Island, threatening to launch missiles loaded with poison gas. Only a young FBI chemical weapons expert and a notorious Federal prisoner have the skills to penetrate the fortress.

programme.title: Back to the Future III
programme.desc: A time traveller ventures to 1885 to prevent his friend's murder and preserve the future.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth has been recovering from brain surgery while Brennan has been on a dig in Guatemala. During a tarot card reading, Angela's psychic reveals that there are bodies buried under a fountain in Washington, D.C.Guests: Cyndi Lauper..

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan and Booth investigate the body of a man murdered for the contents of a briefcase. The team suspects secret operatives are at work, and their theories are supported when the liquefied remains of a CIA agent are discovered in a car trunk.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.desc: Paige conjures up a dream man, but she also unknowingly creates his evil twin.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones become part of a demonic reality television show.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a series of odd murders in a small town and realize that all of them resemble cartoon deaths. Castiel tells Sam and Dean that he's decided to become a hunter like them.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam asks a hunter to keep an eye on Benny without telling Dean, but the hunter thinks Benny is responsible for a vampire kill and decides to take things into his own hands.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Castiel must rescue an angel held captive by Crowley. Meanwhile, Sam meets Amelia, who asks him to make a choice between staying with her and never contacting her again.

programme.title: Supernatural
